subject: RE: [junit] [OT] Eclipse plugin
msgSnippet: Hi, ... I select the class or package in the Package Explorerer (no need to open the class, packages even cannot be opened) The select Run/Run As/Junit Test
messageBody:
Hi,

> I have been combing through Eclipse docs and configuration files, etc.
> but to no avail. Does anyone out there know how to add a context menu
> item to an active editor or perspective selection? I would
> like to save
> myself the trouble of having to open an editor on a class just to be
> able to run it as a JUnit test.

I select the class or package in the "Package Explorerer" (no need to open
the class, packages even cannot be opened)
The select
Run/Run As/Junit Test

Bernd
